alert.note: Alert for McLean; Mercer (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 03 at 4:05AM CDT until April 06 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MDT /NOON CDT/ TUESDAY TO 11 PM MDT /MIDNIGHT CDT/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 11 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...McLean and Mercer Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM MDT /Noon CDT/ Tuesday to 11 PM MDT /Midnight CDT/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family member of your travel plans. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
